cinder::EaseInOutBounce Struct Reference

Easing equation for a bounce (exponentially decaying parabolic bounce) ease-in/out, accelerating until halfway, then decelerating. Functor edition. The a parameter controls overshoot, the default producing a 10% overshoot. More...

#include <Easing.h>

Public Attributes

float mA

Detailed Description

Easing equation for a bounce (exponentially decaying parabolic bounce) ease-in/out, accelerating until halfway, then decelerating. Functor edition. The a parameter controls overshoot, the default producing a 10% overshoot.
